quote: I am a runner. Not an actual runner, like with shoes and sweat. Instead, I specialize in leaving uncomfortable situations with alarming speed. Some people need closure, I need space.
quote_letters: I AM A RUNNER NOT AN ACTUAL RUNNER LIKE WITH SHOES AND SWEAT INSTEAD I SPECIALIZE IN LEAVING UNCOMFORTABLE SITUATIONS WITH ALARMING SPEED SOME PEOPLE NEED CLOSURE I NEED SPACE
